content.sentence: Should advertisements aimed at children be banned?
There are arguments for and against banning advertising for children.
Some people claim that the government should not control companies so much
and that advertising is a vital part of doing business.
Advertising campaigns are simply ways of informing clients about the launch of new products.
many products that children want are not good for them,
for example sweets and junk food.
Children are not old and mature enough to make sensible decisions
and are too influenced by advertising.
In addition, advertising can make children want expensive toys
In the long term this will create a society of consumers
who can only find happiness through shopping.
In my opinion, firms should be responsible to their customers
and limit their adverts to healthy, inexpensive products.
